comment:
* Data class for a data request for wearable sensing.
 *
 * @hide

variables.name: REQUEST_BUNDLE_KEY
variables.comment:
* The bundle key for this class of object, used in {@code RemoteCallback#sendResult}.
     *
     * @hide

variables.name: REQUEST_STATUS_CALLBACK_BUNDLE_KEY
variables.comment:
* The bundle key for the status callback for a data request, used in {@code
     * RemoteCallback#sendResult}.
     *
     * @hide

methods.name: public int getDataType()
methods.comment: Returns the data type this request is for.

methods.name: public PersistableBundle getRequestDetails()
methods.comment: Returns the details for this request.

methods.name: public int getDataSize()
methods.comment: Returns the data size of this object when it is parcelled.

methods.name: public void writeToParcel(@NonNull Parcel dest, int flags)
public String toExpandedString()
methods.comment:
* Returns a String representation of this data request that shows its contents.
     *
     * @hide

methods.name: public static int getMaxRequestSize()
methods.comment:
* Returns the maximum allowed size of a WearableSensingDataRequest when it is parcelled.
     * Instances that exceed this size can be constructed, but will be rejected by the system when
     * they leave the isolated WearableSensingService.

methods.name: public static Duration getRateLimitWindowSize()
methods.comment:
* Returns the rolling time window used to perform rate limiting on data requests leaving the
     * WearableSensingService.

methods.name: public static int getRateLimit()
methods.comment:
* Returns the number of data requests allowed to leave the WearableSensingService in each
     * {@link #getRateLimitWindowSize()}.

methodNames: public void writeToParcel(@NonNull Parcel dest, int flags)
